mapper.sql: select d.shpFile_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.shpFile_name, d.shpFile_path, d.shp_color, d.order_num, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_shpFile d
mapper.select: select concat(d.shpFile_id, d.shpFile_name) as shpFile_name from sys_shpFile d left join sys_role_shpFile rd on d.shpFile_id = rd.shpFile_id where d.del_flag = '0' and rd.role_id = #{roleId} order by d.parent_id, d.order_num

select d.shpFile_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.shpFile_name, d.order_num, d.shpFile_path, d.shp_color, d.status, (select shpFile_name from sys_shpFile where shpFile_id = d.parent_id) parent_name from sys_shpFile d where d.shpFile_id = #{shpFileId}
select * from sys_shpFile where find_in_set(#{shpFileId}, ancestors)
select shpFile_id, parent_id, ancestors, shpFile_name, shpFile_path, shp_color from sys_shpFile where del_flag = '0' and shpFile_id in (${shpIds}) and shpFile_name like concat('%.shp')
mapper.insert: insert into sys_shpFile( shpFile_id, parent_id, shpFile_name, fileName, shpFile_path, shp_color, ancestors, order_num, status, create_by, create_time )values( #{shpFileId}, #{parentId}, #{shpFileName}, #{fileName}, #{shpFilePath}, #{shpColor}, #{ancestors}, #{orderNum}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.update:
update sys_shpFile
status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = sysdate()
where shpFile_id in (${ancestors})

update sys_shpFile set status ="1" where shpFile_id in
#{ids}
